text: The Kyiv Post is Ukraine's oldest English language newspaper. == History == American citizen Jed Sunden established the Kyiv Post weekly newspaper on October 18, 1995 in Kyiv, Ukraine. The newspaper Kyiv Post went online in 1997. It highlights political, business and entertainment issues. As of 2020 the newspaper has a 50-member staff team of journalists, including 40 Ukrainians and 10 foreigners. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:1990s establishments in Ukraine Category:1995 establishments in Europe Category:English-language newspapers Category:Kyiv
title: Kyiv Post
